Merchant Mariners Who Are Eligible for All VA Benefits Under PL 95-202
On January 19, 1988, in response to Section 401 of
PL 95-202
, the Secretary of the Air Force approved service aboard certain merchant or public vessels in oceangoing or foreign waters as active duty in World War II (WWII).
If the discharge document shows eligibility under
PL 95-202
, the merchant mariner and his/her survivors are eligible for benefits in the same manner as any other Veteran or survivor.
Reference
:
For more information on the eligibility of merchant mariners under
PL 95-202
, see
38 CFR 3.7(x)(15)
.
